attributes.action: Force local authorities to upgrade soundproofing in all domestic accomodation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With noise nuisance now being regarded as one of the major causes for disputes between neighbours, surely an upgrading of statuatory recommended soundproofing levels in all residential properties would be a first step to all occupants being able to have a peaceful enjoyment of their own home.
